ValidationRule.description: for both SR VOC and GENERAL If Complexity Level equals 4, require Product Description and Aircraft Type to be mandatory (unable to Save unless filled in).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), IF(ISPICKVAL( Complexity_Level__c , "4-Tech-Root Cause Investigation")&& ((ISNULL(Product_Name__c) || ISBLANK(Product_Name__c)) || (ISNULL(Aircraft_Type__c) || ISBLANK(Aircraft_Type__c)) ), true, false) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' )
